modules.name: Sample and hold x16
modules.description: Get 16 random values on trigger (sample and hold). Internal noise only.

modules.name: Modulation Generator x1
modules.description: Get a random value (S&H on internal noise) or LFO with random state (rate, waveform, scale, phase) generated on a trigger. Settings for variance and bias of random, whether to include S&H values and unipolar or bipolar.

modules.name: Modulation Generator x8
modules.description: Get up to 8 random value (S&H on internal noise) or LFO with random state (rate, waveform, scale, phase) generated on a trigger. Settings for variance and bias of random, whether to include S&H values and unipolar or bipolar.

modules.name: Modulation Generator x16
modules.description: Get up to 16 random value (S&H on internal noise) or LFO with random state (rate, waveform, scale, phase) generated on a trigger. Settings for variance and bias of random, whether to include S&H values and unipolar or bipolar.

modules.name: Attenuator x8
modules.description: 8x attenuators with same level.

modules.name: Random Mute x8
modules.description: Randomly mute a defined number of 1-8 channels.

modules.name: Random Stereo Mute x8
modules.description: Randomly mute a defined number of 1-8 stereo channels.

modules.name: Arithmetic
modules.description: A bunch of arithmetic tricks on two inputs.

modules.name: Logic
modules.description: A bunch of logic tricks on two inputs.

modules.name: Sine Oscillator
modules.description: A tiny sine based oscillator.

modules.name: Saw Oscillator
modules.description: A tiny saw based oscillator.

modules.name: Square Oscillator
modules.description: A tiny square based oscillator.

modules.name: Triangle Oscillator
modules.description: A tiny triangle based oscillator.

modules.name: Sine+ Oscillator
modules.description: Three sine based oscillators with detune and sync.

modules.name: Sawtooth+ Oscillator
modules.description: Three sawtooth based oscillators with detune and sync.

modules.name: Square+ Oscillator
modules.description: Three square based oscillators with detune and sync.

modules.name: Triangle+ Oscillator
modules.description: Three triangle based oscillators with detune and sync.

modules.name: Random Mix x8
modules.description: Randomly mix 8 channels.

modules.name: Simplex Noise LFO
modules.description: Low-frequency oscillator based on simplex noise.

modules.name: Simplex Noise LFO x8
modules.description: 8x Low-frequency oscillators based on simplex noise.

modules.name: Simplex Oscillator
modules.description: A oscillator based on a simplex noise source.

modules.name: Wavetable Oscillator
modules.description: A wavetable oscillator where you can record your own waves.

modules.name: Random Wrangler
modules.description: Random generation that you control.
